## ConfirmationDialogData interface

Data that can be passed to confirmation dialog

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ConfirmationDialogData 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [confirmationText?](./common-material.confirmationdialogdata.confirmationtext.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Text that is displazed as confirmation text (localization constant) |
|  [dialogCancelText?](./common-material.confirmationdialogdata.dialogcanceltext.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Text that is displayed as cancel button text (localization constant) |
|  [dialogConfirmText?](./common-material.confirmationdialogdata.dialogconfirmtext.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Text that is displayed as confirm button text (localization constant) |
